  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_d25a30f3171749ad1020543b0869ec18e1f2ba6d</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_d25a30f3171749ad1020543b0869ec18e1f2ba6d</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Light waves travelling through an optical fibres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lichtwellen, die durch optische Fasern 
fortpflanzen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vagues de lumière voyageant par fibres optiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ondas da luz que viajam com fibras óticas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Onde della luce che attraversano through fibre 
ottiche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φωτεινά κύματα που ταξιδεύουν μέσω τις οπτικές ίνες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ondas de la luz que viajan con fibras ópticas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows the similarity of light waves travelling through an optical fibre (bottom) from sound waves travelling through a pipe (top).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">optical fibres</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pipes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sound waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die Ähnlichkeit der hellen
Wellen, die durch eine optische Faser (Unterseite) fortpflanzen von 
den Schallwellen, die durch ein Rohr (Oberseite) fortpflanzen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre la similitude des vagues 
légères voyageant par une fibre optique (bas) des vagues saines 
voyageant par une pipe (dessus).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra a similaridade das ondas 
claras que viajam através de uma fibra ótica (fundo) das ondas 
sadias que viajam através de uma tubulação (alto).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra la somiglianza delle onde 
chiare che attraversano through una fibra ottica (parte inferiore) 
dalle onde sonore che attraversano through un tubo (parte superiore).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει την ομοιότητα των 
φωτεινών κυμάτων που ταξιδεύουν μέσω μιας οπτικής ίνας 
(κατώτατο σημείο) από τα υγιή κύματα που ταξιδεύουν μέσω ενός 
σωλήνα (κορυφή).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra la semejanza de las ondas 
ligeras que viajan a través de una fibra óptica (fondo) de las ondas
acústicas que viajan a través de un tubo (tapa).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">optische Fasern</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rohre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schallwellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fibres optiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pipes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vagues saines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fibras óticas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tubulações</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ondas sadias</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fibre ottiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tubi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">onde sonore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οπτικές ίνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σωλήνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">υγιή κύματα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fibras ópticas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">tubos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ondas acústicas</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
